channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Online dating lets us look for similar education levels, adding to income inequality
item.description: Since the emergence of dating apps, Americans have increasingly been marrying someone more like themselves.

item.title: When to book holiday travel this fall: 'That window of low prices is brief,' economist says
item.description: October is an ideal time to book flights for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Hanukkah and New Year's, according to experts. If you miss it, there's a last-ch...

item.title: What traders are saying about new — and now suspended — election-betting rules

item.description: “It’s good for business; it’s morally right; we’re quite good at it; we’re successful,” Dimon said at a Council of Institutional Investors conference ...

item.title: DirecTV, Disney reach deal to end blackout in time for college football
item.description: Disney and DirecTV have reached a deal to end a blackout in time for college football this weekend.

item.title: China just raised its retirement age. American workers should take notice.
Arizona’s Civil War-era abortion ban is officially off the books
item.description: A long-dormant 1864 law had criminalized all abortions except when a woman’s life was jeopardized.

item.title: Pfizer says drug for deadly cancer condition that causes weight loss shows positive trial data
item.description: The results could pave the way for Pfizer's drug ponsegromab to become the first-ever approved treatment specifically for cancer cachexia.

item.title: Here’s why the biggest retailers are crushing smaller chains in a tough economy

item.description: "The upcoming S&P 500 inclusion provides a watershed moment for institutional investors to revisit what they 'know' about PLTR."

item.title: Here's why Americans are going back to Chili's
item.description: Chili's investments in experience and advertising are paying off, as it is enjoying massive same-store sales growth.

item.title: Bitcoin network hits record level of power, but falling profits push miners to AI
item.description: Bitcoin mining is becoming a more difficult business as the network gains strength.

item.title: Nasdaq posts 6% weekly gain as U.S. stocks climb ahead of Fed's rate decision
